# ENGG5105-Advanced-Computer-Architecture
## ENGG5101 Assignment 1 

- This project is controlled by "make"

```shell
# default compile
make
# show the log of each instruction 
make debug

# clean all
make clean
```
- How to run this program
the entry address is **30**
```shell
#run
./icpu ios 30
```

For example: 
Because four processes print A, B, C, D respectively, the default output:
```shell
......
```

if use "make debug", the output would have the detail of each instruction:
```shell
...
Before
CPU Registers: SP-7, PC-113, IR-0xc0000fe, PSR-0x1, R[0]-0x0, R[1]-0x71, R[2]-0x1d, R[3]-0x41
Instruction: put R3
R[3]: A
AAfter
CPU Registers: SP-7, PC-114, IR-0x11030000, PSR-0x1, R[0]-0x0, R[1]-0x71, R[2]-0x1d, R[3]-0x41
...

```
